কিভাবে কাজ করে\u003F Create a fun and easy way to gift your friend where you can invite other friends to contribute a minimum fund on the whole product price. Once contributed amount reached target, Fantacy will take care of the rest! 1. Select the product which you want to gift \n2. Share and invite your friends to contribute a gift amount \n3. After the successful contribution, gift will deliver to recipient ঠিক আছে আরো জানুন গ্রহণকারী বাছাই করুন ব্যক্তিগতকৃত করুন অবদানসমূহ গ্রহণকারীর নাম পিছনে Gift title Gift message Note (You can leave personalized note to merchant here) Add LaalSobuj users (E.g. @kairav) Share with LaalSobuj users Ask your friends to contribute শেষ Contribute now This group gift must receive all contributions by %1$s to be successful. Unsuccessful gift will be refunded. Created ডেলিভারির ঠিকানা Creator Recipient Contributors Total amount Total contributions Pending Gift expired No contributors Your minimum contribution is 5% Pay now Buying a gift is always a clueless task. LaalSobuj has now made gifting an easier task, Simply buy the gift card and send it to recipient and checkout plenty of products Select value History How to use gift card\u003F 1. Enter recipient name and value of gift card you would like to purchase then click Pay now. \n2. After complete the checkout process, your recipient will receive Gift card. \n3. Then select the item and pay by Gift card using voucher number. Gift history Sent Debit Received Sender Total Used Available Your referral URL Invite your friends on LaalSobuj and earn %1$s . Once your friend sign up and makes a purchase within 60 days. Refer a friends How to use referral code\u003F 1. Share this code with your friends. \n2. Once your friend sign up and makes a purchase within 60 days, Your credit balance will get added. \n3. You can use your credit balance when checkout the items.
